00032 const std::string TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE = "../data/test.file.data_dat";
00033 
00034 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( DataGroupTest );
00035 
00036 DataGroupTest::DataGroupTest()
00037 {
00038         data = 0;
00039         dc = 0;
00040 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00041         fileHandle = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
00042         fileMapHandle = NULL;
00043 #endif
00044 }

00047 {
00048 
00049 }
00050 
00051 void DataGroupTest::setUp()
00052 {
00053         data = new GenericData;
00054         GenericFileReader reader;
00055         reader.SetFilename(TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE);
00056         reader.ReadHeader(*data);
00057         DataGroupHdrIt dchBegin, dchEnd;
00058         data->Header().GetDataGroupIts(dchBegin, dchEnd);
00059         void* handle = MapFile(TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE);
00060         dc = new DataGroup(TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE, *dchBegin, handle);
00061 }
00062 
00063 void DataGroupTest::tearDown()
00064 {
00065         delete data;
00066         delete dc;
00067         UnmapFile();
00068 }
00069 
00070 void DataGroupTest::CreationTest()
00071 {
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dc != 0);
00073 }
00074 
00075 void DataGroupTest::HeaderTest()
00076 {
00077         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dc->Header().GetName() == L"First Data Cube");
00078 }
00079 
00080 void DataGroupTest::DataSetByIndexTest()
00081 {
00082         DataSet* dataPlane = dc->DataSet(0);
00083         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane);
00084 
00085         // Check the DataSet data
00086         dataPlane->Open();
00087         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->BytesPerRow() == 2);
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Rows() == 100);
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Cols() == 1);
00090 
00091         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00092         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00093         {
00094                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00095                 u_int16_t value;
00096                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 0, value));
00097                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00098         }
00099 
00100         dataPlane->Close();     // optional - Delete will call this
00101         dataPlane->Delete();
00102 }
00103 
00104 void DataGroupTest::DataSetByNameTest()
00105 {
00106         DataSet* dataPlane = dc->DataSet(L"acquired data");
00107         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane);
00108 
00109         // Check the DataSet data
00110         dataPlane->Open();
00111         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->BytesPerRow() == 2);
00112         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Rows() == 100);
00113         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Cols() == 1);
00114 
00115         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00116         for( int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row )
00117         {
00118                 u_int16_t expected = (u_int16_t)(row*10+row);
00119                 u_int16_t value;
00120                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, 0, value));
00121                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00122         }
00123 
00124         dataPlane->Close();     // optional - Delete will call this
00125         dataPlane->Delete();
00126 }

00128 void* DataGroupTest::MapFile(const std::string& fileName)
00129 {
00130 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00131         if (fileHandle == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00132         {
00133                 // Create the file.
00134                 fileHandle = CreateFile(fileName.c_str(), GENERIC_READ, FILE_SHARE_READ,
00135                                 NULL, OPEN_EXISTING, FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, NULL);
00136                 if (fileHandle == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00137                 {
00138                         return 0;
00139                 }
00140         }
00141         if (fileMapHandle == NULL)
00142         {
00143                 // Use the current size of the file.
00144                 DWORD dwSizeHigh = 0;
00145                 DWORD dwSizeLow  = 0;
00146                 fileMapHandle = CreateFileMapping(fileHandle, NULL, PAGE_READONLY, dwSizeHigh, dwSizeLow, NULL);
00147                 if (fileMapHandle == NULL)
00148                         return 0;
00149         }
00150         return fileMapHandle;
00151 #else
00152         return 0;
00153 #endif
00154 }
00155 
00156 void DataGroupTest::UnmapFile()
00157 {
00158 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00159         if (fileHandle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00160         {
00161                 if (fileMapHandle != NULL)
00162                 {
00163                         CloseHandle(fileMapHandle);
00164                         fileMapHandle = NULL;
00165                 }
00166                 CloseHandle (fileHandle);
00167                 fileHandle = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
00168         }
00169 #endif
00170 }
